Emma Watson: s social media accounts were dormant since mid-2020, leading to speculation about her retirement.
Daily Mail reported on February 20: 2021, that Watson was retiring from acting to spend time with her partner, sparking widespread discussion among fans.
Other news outlets fact: checked the claim and reached out to Watson's team, who confirmed that the rumor was false.
Watson: s manager, Jason Weinberg, stated that while her social media accounts were inactive, her career was still active, contradicting the retirement claim.
